name: Nijiiro Dodgeball: Otome-tachi no Seishun
overview: Nijiiro Dodge Ball Otome tachi no seishun is the second dodge ball game developed by Million and published by Atlus. The game combines elements of Super Dodge Ball with growth sim elements. Similar to Super Dodge Ball Advance, this game has no Kunio-kun characters. A planned deluxe pack version of the game includes guide book and a set of 12 postcards, but the plan was scrapped. The items became available through early orders of the game. In addition, pre-orders through Sofmap, Messe Sanoh, Gamers receive telephone card. There are two games modes: Story mode: In which you play as the coach, your mission is to train and promote your team to become the champion. But the player controls the team members during the matchs. Quick match (play againts another human player or againts the cpu player).
